name: Dear Neighbour
description:
Description

Dear Neighbour is a 3rd person cosy game with light puzzling, where you improve your neighbourhood and connect with your neighbours through magical knitting and sage advice. Inspired by real-life “neighbourhood grandparents”, this game is a celebration of those of our neighbours who spend their retirement helping the people in their community with their struggles, big and small.


The team

The game was developed in the context of the Making Games class, at the Master in Game (ITU University of Copenhagen), the fall semester of 2021.
The following people worked on the project:

Tobias Dahl Nielsen - Project lead, Gameplay programmer

 Sarah Sander - Writer, Producer                              

Michal Jurewicz - Level Designer, Programmer

Simone Cibrario Nona - Narrative Designer, UI designer

Julie Løwe - Concept Artist

Daniel Karlsmose Boel - QA lead, Writer

Toader Carausu - Tech lead, Programmer
